壵字的基本解释

壵
zhuàng
古同“壮”。

壵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuàng］
［《廣韻》側亮切，去漾，莊。］
亦作“壵1”。“壮1”的繁体字。
(1)强壮；壮盛；盛大。
(2)坚实；牢固。
(3)勇猛；威猛。
(4)豪壯；豪迈。
(5)壮观。
(6)推崇，赞许。
(7)肥壮；粗壮。
(8)粗细的程度。
(9)男子三十为“壯”。即壮年。后泛指成年。
(10)少壮，年轻。指年未满二十岁。
(11)指青春。
(12)壮大；加强。
(13)指能力强，做事迅速。
(14)竭力。
(15)激烈；强烈。
(16)中医艾灸法术语，一灼称一“壯”。
(17)通“莊”。美。
(18)通“莊”。庄重。
(19)通“裝”。盛入。
(20)我国少数民族名。旧作“僮”。详“壯族”。
[②]［qiāng］
［《廣韻》在良切，平陽，從。］
亦作“壵2”。“壮2”的繁体字。通“戕1”。
伤。
[③]［zhuāng］
［《字彙補》音莊］
亦作“壵3”。“壮3”的繁体字。
姓。春秋时有壮驰兹。见《国

壵字的康熙字典解释

【備考】【丑集】【士字部】　壵； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页243第05
【字彙補】同壯。見《藏經字義》。

壵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
壵字的起名意思

古同“壮”。

壵
Basic explanation of words
壵
zhuàng
Ancient Tong "Zhuang".
壵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuàng］
["Guangyun" cuts brightly, goes to Yang, Zhuang. ]
Also known as "壵1". Traditional characters for "庄1".
(1) Strong; strong; grand.
(2) Firm; firm.
(3) Bravery; mighty.
(4) Heroic; heroic.
(5) Spectacular.
(6) Respect and praise.
(7) Fat and strong; stout.
(8) The degree of thickness.
(9) Men in thirty are "strong". That is the prime of life. Later refers to adulthood.
(10) Young and young. Refers to under twenty years of age.
(11) Refers to youth.
(12) Strengthen; strengthen.
(13) Refers to strong ability and quick work.
(14) Do your best.
(15) Intense; intense.
(16) The terminology of moxibustion in traditional Chinese medicine, one burning means one "zhuang".
(17) Link "Zhuang". nice.
(18) Link "Zhuang". solemn.
(19) Through "installation". Sheng into.
(20) The names of ethnic minorities in our country. The old work "Child". Detailed "Zhuang nationality".
[②]［qiāng］
["Guangyun" is in Liangqie, Pingyang, Cong. ]
Also known as "壵2". "Zhuang 2" in traditional characters. Same as "戕1".
hurt.
[③]［zhuāng］
[The Yinzhuang of "Zihuibu"]
Also known as "壵3". "Zhuang 3" in traditional characters.
name. In the spring and autumn, there is a strong gallop. See "Country
